articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: United States men's soccer team qualifies  for first Olympics since 2008
articles.description: The United States men routed Honduras in the semifinals of the CONCACAF U-20 Championship to secure the first Olympics berth since 2008.
articles.content: The United States qualified for its first Olympic men's soccer tournament since 2008 when the Americans beat Honduras 3-0 at San Pedro Sula on Friday night in the semifinals of the Under-20 champions… [+1593 chars]

articles.title: Bettors liking Los Angeles Lakers' title odds despite no big moves from the team
articles.description: Bettors have been gravitating toward odds for the Lakers to win the NBA title next season despite the team not having made any significant moves to a roster that missed the playoffs last season.
articles.content: The Phoenix Suns and Miami Heat saw their championship odds improve at sportsbooks, when news broke Thursday that Kevin Durant was requesting a trade from the Brooklyn Nets and reportedly eyeing thos… [+1639 chars]

articles.author: Tim MacMahonESPN Staff Writer
articles.title: Sources - Utah Jazz trading star center Rudy Gobert to Minnesota Timberwolves for four first-round picks
articles.description: Minnesota is sending its 2023, 2025 and 2027 picks unprotected and a top-5-protected 2029 pick to Utah in exchange for Rudy Gobert, sources told ESPN.
articles.content: The Utah Jazz agreed to trade center Rudy Gobert to the Minnesota Timberwolves in a blockbuster deal that will pair him with fellow All-Star big man Karl-Anthony Towns, sources told ESPN's Adrian Woj… [+3802 chars]

articles.title: Pac-12 'to explore all expansion options' after UCLA and USC announce exit to Big Ten in 2024
articles.description: Pac-12 presidents and chancellors were authorized Friday to "explore all expansion options" for the conference after USC and UCLA decided to join the Big Ten in 2024.
articles.content: The Pac-12 presidents and chancellors on Friday morning authorized the conference "to explore all expansion options" following the decisions of USC and UCLA to join the Big Ten in 2024, according to … [+1719 chars]

articles.title: Golden State Warriors, Kevon Looney agree to three-year contract, sources say
articles.description: Free-agent center Kevon Looney, whose rebounding prowess helped the Warriors in their run to the NBA title, has agreed to a three-year, $25.5 million deal to return to Golden State, sources told ESPN.
articles.content:
Free-agent center Kevon Looney has agreed to a three-year, $25.5 million deal to return to the Golden State Warriors, sources told ESPN's Adrian Wojnarowski on Friday.
Looney has grown into a stable… [+900 chars]

articles.title: Boston Celtics acquire Malcolm Brogdon in trade with Indiana Pacers, sources say
articles.description: The Celtics acquired playmaking point guard Malcom Brogdon in a trade with the Pacers without having to give up a core player, sources told ESPN. The Pacers landed another first-round pick in the deal.
articles.content:
The Indiana Pacers are trading guard Malcolm Brogdon to the Boston Celtics, sources told ESPN's Adrian Wojnarowski on Friday.

articles.title: Sources -- Atlanta Hawks trade Kevin Huerter to Sacramento Kings for Justin Holiday, Mo Harkless, future first-round pick
articles.description: The Sacramento Kings have acquired sharpshooter Kevin Huerter from the Atlanta Hawks in return for Justin Holiday, Mo Harkless and a top-14 protected first-round pick in 2024, sources tell ESPN.
articles.content:
The Sacramento Kings reached a deal to acquire Atlanta Hawks guard Kevin Huerter for a 2024 protected first-round pick and two players on Friday, sources told ESPN.

articles.title: Baltimore Ravens' Jaylon Ferguson died from combined effects of fentanyl, cocaine, officials say
articles.description: The Maryland Department of Heath said the death of Ravens linebacker Jaylon Ferguson on June 21 was ruled an accident. He was 26.
articles.content:
